duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage functional teams through program execution for products and services in the aerospace and defense industry.
Represent the engineering department at all management level meetings and ensure that engineering design, documentation, and approvals meet program schedules.
Own and continuously improve processes and procedures, oversee training of staff, and provide technical direction as required.
Tailor solutions to customer cost, performance, and schedule requirements, and design to consistently exceed expectations.
Motivate and work with others in a highly collaborative, fast-paced environment emphasizing rapid prototyping and fielding of capabilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's of Science degree in a related discipline and typically 12 or more years of relevant technical experience. Master's degree preferred.
